CustomField.formula: IF( DAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) < 10, '0' & TEXT(DAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))), TEXT(DAY(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))) ) + "/" + IF( MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)) < 10, '0' & TEXT(MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))), TEXT(MONTH(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate))) ) + "/" + TEXT(YEAR(DATEVALUE(CreatedDate)))
CustomField.label: Data de criação (formatada)
